Joseph Alfred Serret was #botd in 1819, one of the French mathematicians after whom the Frenet-Serret formulas (for a 'frame' of the same name) were named. Here's a nice animation showing what that frame does to a spatial curve
Sliding along a curve

The #rstats work of 
@kyle_e_walker
 has made it incredibly easier for anyone to access & analyze spatial + microdata from the US. It has also largely influenced the work of so many others, including myself with the #geobr. This book is a GREAT refence even before it's published!
